snippet.title: The Last Worker | End-Stage Capitalism Trailer
snippet.description:
Zelda Williams (The Legend of Korra) and Tommie Earl Jenkins (Death Stranding) join the star-studded cast of The Last Worker, a first person narrative adventure centred around humanity’s struggle in an increasingly automated world. 

Witness the dystopian, thought-provoking world of the game in the brand-new ‘End-Stage Capitalism’ trailer, featuring Zelda, as well as existing cast members David Hewlett, Jason Isaacs and Ólafur Darri Ólafsson.

**DISPATCHING LATER IN 2022**

WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579280
WEBSITE: https://www.thelastworker.com/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/thelastworker

About Jörg Tittel
Born in Brussels in 1978, Jörg Tittel is a London based writer, director and producer. His feature film debut THE WHITE KING starring Jonathan Pryce and Fiona Shaw, which he co-directed with his wife and production partner Alex Helfrecht, premiered at the 2016 Edinburgh International Film Festival, where it was nominated for the Michael Powell Award for Best British Feature. Besides writing and directing THE LAST WORKER, he is currently producing A WINTER’S JOURNEY starring John Malkovich. THE LAST WORKER is his VR debut.

About Wolf & Wood
Ryan Bousfield and his team at Wolf & Wood have created internationally recognised VR titles, including A CHAIR IN A ROOM: GREENWATER (2016), THE EXORCIST: LEGION VR (2018) and HOTEL R’n’R (2020) and have worked on all major VR platforms including HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest, PlayStation VR and Steam VR. https://wolfandwood.co.uk

#MetaQuest2 #NintendoSwitch #PlayStation5 #XboxSeriesX #PC #TheLastWorker
